website_summaries.verdict: A comprehensive egg cooker complete with extender ring and the ability to make poached eggs and omelettes.
pros: Owners rave about the perfection of the timing
Simply add water and eggs and press a button

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My fiance seems to always be making dishes with eggs in them. She has one just like this but is only able to do 6 eggs at once with it. We just used this yesterday and it worked perfect. The one minor thing she noticed was the spike to poke the hole in the shell isn't as sharp as her other one. She wants to get another, so obviously it's a great item.
customer_reviews.author: nv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect eggs
customer_reviews.text: I recently got mine and I absolutely love it. I have made hard boiled, omelette and poached and they all came out great!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great Hard Boiled Eggs
customer_reviews.text: I have only made hard boiled eggs with this maker and it was great. It was easy to use and the eggs turned out perfect. Great little machine.
customer_reviews.author: mindi rue

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic - stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Well it lasted 2 months. Cheaply made. Cheap flimsy plastic. Stopped working after about 4 or 5 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amanzi

customer_reviews.title: This little kitchen device actually does quite a good job. Super simple to use and so far ...
customer_reviews.text: This little kitchen device actually does quite a good job. Super simple to use and so far the eggs have turned out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Evierose

customer_reviews.title: I have all of copper chef items & love them. This is perfect for breakfast
customer_reviews.text: I have all of copper chef items & love them. This is perfect for breakfast, lunch, salads & snacks with a large family.
customer_reviews.author: LESLIE J GORDON

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Device turns on by itself 10 min after auto shutoff. Also, even though I followed the directions exactly, soft boiled eggs turned out a mushy mess as you can see in the picture. The whites were runny. Hard to peel. Hard boiled eggs turned out greenish around the yolk. And there is no alarm to tell you when it’s done. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy. 14 eggs in about 15 min. Super easy
customer_reviews.text: First off, and I know you wouldn't think to nor should you need to, but wash the outside of the eggs off before you use. I had cracked egg juice melt off one egg and end up in the bottom. Black mess and talk about stink!! But, it cleaned up with just water. And the eggs themselves are amazing. I don't use it for anything but hard boiled, and being able to do 14 at a time and in about 15 min is awesome. Any way, no issues yet, used it several times so far. Mom likes it for devilled eggs too. Quick and easy, no mess.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Use it to make boiled eggs. It is nice that you can use the second shelf to cook a bunch at once. Easy instructions and easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine T Dutton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Eggs
customer_reviews.text: My Wife loves this Electric egg cooker. I think she has been cooking eggs every 3 days now. It's very easy to use, but, the instructions that come with it, say to pierce the egg. WHAT EVER YOU DO, DON'T PIERCE THE EGGS!!! Follow all the instructions but that one. The eggs come out perfect each time. I rated the ability to clean at a 4 not a 5, cause sometimes you may get a slim from the eggs during steaming and when the machine shuts off it may burn a little on the inside base. If the inside base had a cookware coating it might be easier then the current inside look.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Nee

customer_reviews.title: Power Button Issues with Two Machines
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. Got it straight out of the box, read the instructions, plugged it in, and the power button didn’t work. Very disappointed but easy replacement policy and had a new one already shipped out before I got this one returned. The second one came in and same thing, power button wouldn’t work. It is supposed to have an automatic shut off feature so that eggs can not be overcooked or create a hazard. The power button acted like it was suck in the on position and wouldn’t turn off, which made me worried. Ended up returning this one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Broke after using it once.
customer_reviews.text: Used once and it quit working. It's not copper it's plastic. Light wont stay on so it doesn't heat up correctly. Waste of money and time and eggs.
customer_reviews.author: michelle fromwiller

customer_reviews.title: By 2nd use it wouldnt turn on
customer_reviews.text: After my first use, I would have given it 5 stars. But after trying to use it a second time and not being able to get it to turn on, 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: K M S

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this cheap appliance.  Other brands are much better!
customer_reviews.text: No matter how I arranged and carefully put a hole in the eggs, the same side if the cooker cooked too fast causing the eggs. To burst their shell. This is the third egg cooker I’ve purchased and the worse. The plastic is cheap. Hard to clean up the cooked eggs. I threw it away after a fifth attempt to cook without mess. Don’t buy. I’d give no stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: You never know about these kinds of things but this really works great. We have fresh eggs that are a little harder to deal with boiled but using this makes it a no problem. I'm not crazy about the taste of the eggs when using the other things but those are super easy and fast too. So when in a hurry, go for a fast egg sandwich. Boiled eggs are now so much easier to make. Works great, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm sold
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim. I usually don't buy things for the kitchen that only do one thing (well, except for the coffee maker of course) but I thought I would try this since it has been mentioned in a couple of "best products for 2018" lists. I did a test batch of 7 eggs and am really happy with the results. It is easy to use, the eggs peeled easily, and were the most tender hard cooked eggs I have made. I typically do a dozen eggs at a time and eat them for snacks over the course of a week so this is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Earlnabby

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Potential fire hazard. Threw it away after 3rd use. Followed direction and seemed like no brainer but had to throw out several eggs. And during pandemic beginning, eggs were in shortage and I don't like wasting food anyway. Omelet tray melted to bottom of burner with more than enough water added. The water measuring cup apparently is not correct or the heating element is not set set properly. Poked the eggs prior to hard boiling and the eggs still came out through the top or cracked and poured all over inside.
customer_reviews.author: S McBeath

customer_reviews.title: Much quieter than Dash cooker
customer_reviews.text: Had a Dash cooker previous to this one and function is identical (both have automatic turnoff), but Dash cooker had an extremely loud and harsh buzzer when cooking completed - very odd. This Copper Chef egg cooker just makes a click when complete, which is a big improvement. Overall a very handy product, much less messy and less power consumption than boiling in a hot pot or on the stove.
customer_reviews.author: GSONC27410

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: I had a 7 egg one for several years (not this brand) that finally gave up the ghost, so I bought this one. It's perfect and I highly recommend it. You can do as many eggs as you like and if you follow the directions, they're perfect every time. People have left "hard to clean" in the reviews. Duh and no. The base is not washable because of the electronics. It's called white vinegar people. I fill the base and let it sit for a few hours, dump out the vinegar and wipe with a microfiber towel....spotless. I also like the fact that this comes apart for storage....doesn't take up tons of space.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie 9

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My sister mentioned to me she had bought one of these, and since I like this brand I decided I would buy one also. I cooked a dozed eggs with absolutely no problems at all, and they came out perfectly done. Taking the shells off was easy, and cleaning the device was no problem at all. I would definitely recommend this product to anybody who may be interested. To be honest I have not made an omelette with it, but since that’s not something I think about it’s no big deal to me. Just remember to measure the water, pierce the eggs (and position them correctly) and then push the button. Quick and easy
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great you can't boil water as fast as this egg cooker works live it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Schriner

customer_reviews.title: does great eggs but may leak
customer_reviews.text: it does a good job. Keep a rag under it though cause it may leek out the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Hyatt

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS! Yes, it has an "auto off" but it also keeps turning back on. Can't trust it to turn off.
customer_reviews.text: DANGEROUS! Yes, it has an "auto off" but it also keeps turning back on. Can't trust it to turn off. Sure, it makes eggs perfectly. This is 100% true. However, the "auto off" is complete garbage. Yes, it turns off when the water boils, but then in a minute it turns back on, and the light glows, and it gets super hot again. That's clearly a fire hazard, and not actually turning off as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Testing Test

customer_reviews.title: perfectly cooked eggs
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have always had problems making the perfect poached egg but not any more. I also love a good hard cooked but they've always been difficult to peel but not any more. I haven't tried the omelet cook but I've no doubt that it too will be great. The only thing difficult is being able to see the print on the water measuring cup and old eyes lol. This appliance sits proudly on my flattop stove since I am short on counter space and want it where I can use it often.
customer_reviews.author: cactusflower

customer_reviews.title: Great Eggs!
customer_reviews.text: I love hard-boiled eggs but the guessing part was always the problem; how long do I boil them? Are they fully cooked? Are they overcooked? This machine takes the guessing game away. I have used this twice and absolutely LOVE the results. Perfect each time! I also enjoy the automatic shut-off -- what a great safety feature! I have yet to try it for poaching or omelets (I've never had an omelet), but I'm sure it works great for all it's intended purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Dreadlover

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My husband fixed me poached eggs. He followed the directions and they still were not cooked all the way. I hate when the whites don't get cooked all the way and these had tops that even when I scraped the runny whites off, they were still slimy. I haven't tried to fix hard boiled eggs yet so I can't say anything about that.
customer_reviews.author: luvtoread

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is great i use it often my mom loves it.. Works as advertised.. Eggs taste great
customer_reviews.author: sburke757

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This makes prefect hard boiled eggs every time! You won't want to go back to boiling them! The only minor complaint I have is the power button doesn't turn off automatically and there's no way to set it to cook on a timer. So you have to make sure to set a timer on your phone or microwave but other than that, if you follow the instructions in the book, your eggs will turn out great! A rare as seen on TV product that works as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: J. Stoneking

customer_reviews.title: FAILURE
customer_reviews.text: I used this product one time. When I went to use it again, it had a burning smell and shut off. It had water in the tray with the eggs at this time. I unplugged it and then waited a few minutes and proceeded to plug it back in, It did not work. I couldn't return the item only because I not longer had the box it came in. I WOULD LIKE A REFUND ON THIS DEFECTIVE PRODUCT. This is the first time since using Amazon that I have had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Worked 4 times. Only 60 day warranty
customer_reviews.text: Worked 4 timed. Now overcooks eggs. ONLY 60 day warranty. UPDATE: Downgrade. After couple months use, cooker is overcooking eggs with very green yolks and rubbery scrambled eggs.
customer_reviews.author: VikingQueen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My kids love hard boiled eggs so I make a least a dozen a week. This product is a life saver. My only complaints are... 1. No beep sound when done so you have to watch the light turn off 2. Maybe my counter is tilted but the bottom of the pan and top of the eggs burn a little. Other than that this is a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Luckybethany

customer_reviews.title: Timesaver that I use all the time
customer_reviews.text: This is one on my favorite products. It makes cooking eggs super easy. We use it for hard boiled eggs, or hard boiled eggs to make egg salad and deviled eggs. No more watching the stove to make sure the pan does not boil over. You can fill this with the required water and leave it to cook as it has an automatic shutoff. I have given this many times as a gift and everyone loves it.
customer_reviews.author: the friend

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The unit is no longer working 1 month after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Geeta

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money! Terrible product, cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst steamer I've ever used. I made hard boiled eggs, followed instructions yolks floated to top of egg leaves open end so deviling and peeling were next to impossible.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: perfect egg cooker
customer_reviews.text: 14 eggs hard boilded in ess that 23 minutes with no mess, no pans of boiling water. I LOVE this egg cooker, poacher and omelett maker. cleans right up and tucks away win minimal space. Because of the tiny prick you make in the bottom of egg then put in cooker up side down, the peeling is a greeze. it shuts off automaticly and cooks the gess hard, mediun or solft boiled. Hightly recommend it to anyone who looves their eggs ans just doesn't have the time to be worried bout the mess after gooking clean up and the timeing.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Bowl stained after only one use
customer_reviews.text: I received my new Egg Maker and used it for the first time. I read the manual front to back and followed the directions for 7 eggs. Although the eggs came out nicely, the water bowl was stained as if burned. I washed the bowl immediately and vigorously, but the stain is still there. If any other user, or the Copper Chef company is aware of this issue, your help will be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Phillips

customer_reviews.title: The handiest kitchen gadget I never knew I needed
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it cooks perfect hard boiled eggs every time. The shells are easy peel and they are never cracked. I love hard boiled eggs but I had a very bad habit of putting them on and then getting distracted/busy and forgetting about them. This solves that problem. I can cook a perfect dozen eggs now -it turns off by itself when they are done. It's easy to use and easy to clean. I am very happy with this purchase :D.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda M. Caughey

customer_reviews.title: Home run item
customer_reviews.text: I eat HB eggs every day at work camp. For ease I just bought pretty cooked from store but they where hit or miss on taste and texture as well as $6/doz. Bought this and used this AM. Best buy I've done in quite a while. Place measured water in bottom, place eggs on rack, cover and 20 minutes later is shuts off by self and done. So easy even a ............. well you know. BOTTOM LINE IS BUY IT.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Kornkven

customer_reviews.title: What a novel gift idea for newly weds
customer_reviews.text: This egg cooker is so handy for anytime hard boiled eggs. Three eggs and in nothing flat you have a delicious egg salad sandwich, omlet, poached eggs. Cooks 14 eggs at one time, other makers and moldes only handle 12 eggs at a time. Compact, doesn't take up much cupboard or counter top space. Everything rinses clean with cold water. And the part I liked the most is the eggs were super easy to peel.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Possibly a money saver
customer_reviews.text: Wife boils a lot of eggs. Typically 1-1/2 to 2 dozen a week. I bought it hoping it would be a little more energy efficient than the stove and plus needed to come up with something I could call a gift. When she does them on the stove, she often forgets about them and lets them go for 5 to 10 or maybe even 15 minutes longer than needed. This is so easy to use. She loves it. Plus maybe it will pay for itself in a year or 2 in savings from not having the stove on for 5 to 15 minutes longer than needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: I used to be an ugly egg maker
customer_reviews.text: Ok.. so all three hacks and tricks could not save me. I used to hate trying to make pretty hard boiled eggs. Baking soda trick? Tried it. Exact timing? Did it. The shells peeled with half the egg. Always. I was never picked to make the deviled eggs for any get together.... until now. This magic egg maker makes pretty eggs every time. EVERY TIME. Sorcery.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: OK while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: It worked good while it lasted. It’s 90% plastic parts. Had mine a little less than 3 months when it stopped working. It only has a 60 day warranty so I was just out of that range unfortunately. The button stopped working so I took it apart to see if maybe it was jammed or something but no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect eggs with little time and effort
customer_reviews.text: I have been making hard-boiled eggs for years, and like many, have had my share of "unpeelable" ones. This little gadget is amazing!! Not only is it tinier than i ever thought, it can hardboil a dozen eggs perfectly, with very little work on my part...and they peel perfectly every time!!!! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: We make hard boiled eggs a lot and always seem to have trouble with them cracking and more important, peeling them. My brother recommended this machine because he says the eggs come out great. We were pleasantly surprised how great the eggs come out. Always easy to peel. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous - turned on by itself
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this machine, it hard boiled eggs and seemed to correctly turn off by itself (auto-off). I removed the eggs but left it plugged in. About half an hour later I realized the machine had turned back on, by itself. The power light was on. There was no water in the unit and the metal base was extremely hot. This is clearly a fire hazard. I won't be using it again -- too dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Holly A.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to peel
customer_reviews.text: I have no problem cooking eggs the old fashioned way on the stove, but this cooker is so easy, just measure the water using the measuring cup, pour into the base, put holes in top of eggs with the tool provided, turn on and let cook. Eggs come out perfect and super easy to peel! (Something that usually doesn’t happen when I cook them on the stove).
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Betit

customer_reviews.title: Good but very delicate
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected, plus its all plastic. I thought it would be much more sturdier and stronger. Overall it does work and it does cook the eggs very well. It's all by steam so if your expecting chef made eggs, you won't get that. But it does the job and it is very simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Your kitchen needs one of these
customer_reviews.text: I have one in my kitchen that I use weekly to make hard boiled eggs. This item is so great I have gifted it 3 times and the recipient just loves it also. The eggs cooked in this peel so easy. Sometimes the shell comes off in 2 pieces. I have never had the shell stick and or a mess peeling. It does 14 eggs at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this little egg maker. Bought one for my parents too. Makes perfect hard eggs and I like the small omelette pan. Wish it had a sound of some sort to indicate the eggs were done instead of just turning off, other than that, this is well used in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Holt

customer_reviews.title: Thanks .
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to use and it seamed every thing came out ok ? It would be nice if the omelets were just a little bigger . The cook time was very good but could use a beeper I think to let you know when it's done . But all and all it's awesome to use in the kitchen . Thanks again .
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: No Clucks, Chirps or Buzz
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an egg cooker that makes cute sounds, this device is not for you. BUT if you're looking for a compact, good looking egg cooker that does the job without a hassle, this little 14 egg cooker by Copper Chef is the appliance for you. It's reasonably priced, easy to use and best of all, it does the job you want. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Goldenberg

customer_reviews.title: Not as impressed as with other Copper Chef items I own
customer_reviews.text: Item works ok, but not as pleased as with the two old egg cookers I've had, but it works 'good enough' that I kept it. What I AM impressed with, is this seller! First unit had a bad problem & I requested a refund. Since I've been wanting a large quantity egg cooker, I didn't think to ask for a replacement unit, but Seller did ask! I said ok, why not, might just be that particular item. I received the replacement very quickly & the return item was smoothly managed. I hope to use this seller again! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: S. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect egg maker
customer_reviews.text: If you struggle with peeling hard boiled eggs this is for you. I make deviled eggs a lot and have made at least 100 eggs since purchasing this. The egg shells are so easy to peel and no more eggs with pieces missing or ending up as egg salad instead of a deviled egg. I love this, bought some for gifts and recommended it to many people who also purchased one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Street

customer_reviews.title: Easy worry-free hard boiled eggs!
customer_reviews.text: I love this egg cooker! It is so easy and eggs turn out perfectly every time! To make hard-boiled eggs you just put in the required amount of water add up to 14 eggs that you’ve pierced the tops of with the included tool and then turn it on. When the water evaporates the eggs are done and the cooker shuts off. I usually make only 5 or 6 eggs and they always come out perfectly. I’ve made the omelet which was also super easy but I use it mainly for hard boiled eggs. Bought two as gifts. It’s that good!!
customer_reviews.author: DeniseMc

customer_reviews.title: GOOD MACHINE / FOLLOW INSTRUCTIONS
customer_reviews.text: This makes the perfect soft boiled eggs in exactly 6 minutes. I would highly recommend this egg cooker. NOTE: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU OPEN THE LID. OPEN IT SLOWLY TO ALLOW THE STEAM TO ESCAPE. ALSO, LET THE MACHINE COOL DOWN. ON THE VERY BOTTOM IS A NUT AND BOLT EXPOSED AND IT REMAINS HOT FOR SOME TIME. I ACTUALLY BURNED MY FINGER.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and no worry about over cooking. Poached, omlets,hard boiled. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Best egg cooker I have found. Eggs are fluffy and come out delicious. Don't add to much water.
customer_reviews.author: mike schlager

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great!
customer_reviews.text: This goofy contraption actually works! I am very impressed and I love how I can count on it to work every time perfectly. Next time I make an omelette, I will take a picture of it for you. The omelette literally puffs up to like 3 inches! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Perfect egg boiling kit
customer_reviews.text: Using this product every three day now. Fast & easy. Actually you don’t have to put those eggs down to cold water after finished boiling process, just put those eggs inside refrigerator then very easy feel after couple hours later.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth Lee

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: poke hole it egg, add water turn on, walk away. easy peasy lemon squeezy. Updating my review. After using for a short time now. When the egss are cooked now they spill from the small hole made in the shell before cooking. This now burns on the hot surface.
customer_reviews.author: wizardfitz

customer_reviews.title: I gave these as Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to friends and others who did work for me for a Christmas gift. They loved them. Every one is talking about how easy it is to have boiled eggs or to have an omelet, or poached eggs. This is really a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: A.Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Put a hole in Eggs before boiling
customer_reviews.text: I love mine and got one for my sister and she loves hers also. Makes boiling eggs very easy and they peal very east. I have don scrambled, poached, omelet and all turn out perfect. Everyone should have one. Thank you, Jane M. Allen
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: LOVE love LOVE this egg cooker!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my egg cooker. I am always bragging to folks about how easy this is to use and clean-up, The eggs come out PERFECT every time!! I especially like that the eggs peel so easily. I would highly recommend this item. Great to give as gifts. Mine gets used often. It has simplified hard boiling eggs, and perfect ones too. A must have folks...
customer_reviews.author: 3P's

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for family or friend.
customer_reviews.text: I have one and absolutely love this. Eggs are so easy to peel and they are perfect. No more terrible looking eggs. Great for deviled eggs, potato salad, just boiled eggs. Bought one for my daughter. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: This has been the neatest thing I have gotten in quite a while. It works as advertised as far as boiled eggs are concerned and they are very easy to peel. I haven't tried the scrambled or poached eggs in this but can't think why it wouldn't work since it boils eggs so great.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Calchera

customer_reviews.title: greatest hard boiled egg maker
customer_reviews.text: Best product EVER for making hard boiled eggs. I bought this for my 2 daughters and my 2 friends. We love it!!! The real secret is putting the eggs in ice cubes and water after they are done cooking. DMF
customer_reviews.author: DMF

customer_reviews.title: Egg steamer
customer_reviews.text: Did not work straight out of the box, power switch did not turn off or on
customer_reviews.author: rosie schaible

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Product broke after three uses. The power switch no longer works and the copper coating wore off in spots.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who has struggled to peel boiled eggs should have this egg cooker as a staple in their kitchen. The eggs peel perfectly every time! No more torn and mangled eggs. If my cooker should stop working, I will immediately buy another one. Wish I has heard about this earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Maginator

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use. Besides doing eggs I use it to steam the English muffin when creating my version of the "Sausage McMuffin with egg". Egg cooker is versatile and like Alton Brown says, "Never buy a tool that only does one task.".
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Kid

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I've made at least 4 dozen hard boiled eggs with this, all eggs have been easy to peel under running water. I've made poached eggs with his and there was a learning curve. scramble eggs : spray the container first like in the directions .. I'm amazed....
customer_reviews.author: AZPIPEMD

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfectly cooked eggs every time.
customer_reviews.text: This egg cooker makes perfectly cooked eggs every time. It is exceptionally easy to use, and it comes with clear usage instructions. It is a great value for the money. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Flemington

customer_reviews.title: advertising misled me
customer_reviews.text: I understood that I would be able to soft boil up to 14 eggs. Not true. They do not recommend more that 7 eggs for soft boiling. Very disappointing. Also reading the water levels on the plastic cup is VERY DIFFICULT. I have used it once for 7 hard boiled eggs and they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Wentzel

customer_reviews.title: Hate it!
customer_reviews.text: This SUCKS! Much easier just to boil or cook your own!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Good machine but needs a sound to signal when egge are done.
customer_reviews.text: A good looking electric egg cooker. However, there is no buzzer to let you know when the eggs are done so it is easy to overcook the eggs by leaving them in the machine too long even though the machine shuts off automatically. It is nice to cook 14 eggs at a time.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: A great kitchen device
customer_reviews.text: This makes life so much easier when boiling eggs. All you do is poke a hole, add water then set it and forget it. No more burnt, burst and smelly egg odor because you get distracted. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fast & Easy
customer_reviews.text: Likes: easy to clean, fast, makes perfect hard cooked eggs, and you can cook 14 eggs at one time Dislikes: the light will turn off when done but resets itself with no water, have to unplug it. Would buy for other friends but it really is not right
customer_reviews.author: Charles T. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Consistent easy peel results
customer_reviews.text: The eggs are perfect every time and are easy to peel. Puncture each egg with the enclosed tool, put them in and finish getting the kids ready for school.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Mc Bride

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: We've had one of these for the past year & love it so much that I bought 2 as gifts. We use it so much it sits out on my counter...you'll be amazed how easy & good it works. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: CBrown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect eggs!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift to my friend because she was so impressed with mine. I own one for a year. We use it a lot to boil eggs. it was never so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jena G

customer_reviews.title: Neat
customer_reviews.text: I was going to purchase this item and then change my mind. It was too late to cancel so I kept it. Just tried it out the other day and even though it is a simple appliance, it really does work very well. Glad I kept it. So fast and easy to use. Even easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boiled eggs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my spouse for Christmas. Very nice quality and makes boiled eggs just right. It’s nice that it is small that you can store easily.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me, and makes hard boiled eggs super simple and fast. My only con would be it doesn’t store too easy, because there are so many elements.
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: No Fuss Hard Boiled Eggs
customer_reviews.text: If you eat hard boil eggs this product is for you!! Easy to use Easy clean up and easy to store. The hard boiled eggs perfect everytime!! It turns its self off so you don't have to watch over a boiling pot..
customer_reviews.author: The Inquisitor

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: The unit is compact, cooks eggs well but doesn’t seem durable. The plastic parts are flimsy and probably won’t withstand normal use. I expected better quality from Copper Chef.
customer_reviews.author: G Fors

customer_reviews.title: EASY like Sunday morning
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so awesome at making the perfect eggs. It makes mornings easy especially a morning like mine running around trying to get a baby ready for daycare and get ready for work. A healthy breakfast made simple
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Very easy product to use
customer_reviews.text: Eggs are too close together. The pin to put hole in egg makes a bigger hole sometimes and the eggs spill out of the shell while cooking to make a mess, I end up trashing the egg most of the time that happen.
customer_reviews.author: Karlene H

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved hard-boiled eggs and this little product makes them perfectly every time. Definitely prefer using this product to make my hard-boiled eggs opposed to boiling them. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy hardboiled eggs
customer_reviews.text: A breeze to cook hardboiled eggs. We had not used it for anything else. Even we don't have to puncture the eggs..Use little water and it is fast. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Consuelo Coates

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen MUST have!
customer_reviews.text: We use this every week to make boiled eggs. SO easy to use and little to no clean-up. Wish I had found this years ago. PERFECT eggs EVERY time.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: great gift works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: i love soft and hard boiled eggs. I will never again over cook a soft boiled egg and hardboils peel like a dream because of the perfect cook. after using mine a few times i bought one for my sister too
customer_reviews.author: jan evans

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Yes! Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing daily! It poaches, it scrambles, and it makes 14 hard boiled eggs in one sitting. They are easy to peel and always cooked to perfection!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deviled eggs could not be easier
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS AWESOME!!! Deviled eggs couldn't be easier and its great for hard boiling eggs on the weekend to grab 2 and a banana for a quick easy breakfast before work! MOST handy kitchen appliance in close competition with an instapot or microwave :)
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: I loved poached eggs, runny center to dip in toast...so disappointing to get soft boiled.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I love a poached egg....was disappointed because the poached egg was more soft boiled, also there was some clean up from the heating element.....maybe I need to try again to be totally convinced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I use it almost every day. It is so easy to use and I would replace it immediately if it ever broke. It is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: D Webster

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Its quick to set up and cooking time takes care of itself in about 20 minutes you can cook 14 hard boiled eggs easy clean up all around works great
customer_reviews.author: E L

customer_reviews.title: Still the best small appliance in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice as the picture , works great for now, does exactly what it is supposed exactly how it is supposed to. Will review again after few months.
customer_reviews.author: Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: There isn't anything I dont like. I love the fact I dont have to watch it so water doesn't boil out. It shuts off on own and the eggs are perfectly cooked. Just wipe clean -- no pan to clean. I can cook up to 14 eggs at once or just a few. Looking forward to making other types of eggs with accessory items. I've already given one away as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Karen from Connecticut

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs this. It makes hard boil eggs perfect every time, from 1 to full. The eggs are so easy to peel.
customer_reviews.author: Fatena Creselious

customer_reviews.title: Great Egg Cooker
customer_reviews.text: This is the best item ever. I do a lot of deviled eggs for the family and this makes it easy to do 2 dozen in 36 minutes and easy too peel.
customer_reviews.author: tuesday payne

customer_reviews.title: I wanted this to work it did not
customer_reviews.text: Cheap as it looks and the auto turn off does not work, browned the bottom eggs
customer_reviews.author: NOLA guy

product_meta.title: Copper Chef Want The Secret to Making Perfect Eggs & More C Electric Cooker Set-7 or 14 Capacity. Hard Boiled, Poached, Scrambled Eggs, or Omelets Automatic Shut Off, 7.5 x 6.7 x 7.5 inches, Rojo
product_meta.description: Want The Secret to Making Perfect Hard-Boiled Eggs & More? Copper Chef Electric Egg Cooker from As Seen on TV Copper Chef Cookware rapidly cooks hard, medium, or soft boiled eggs, poached eggs, omelets & more in minutes– with just 1 touch! No programming or timers required – Advanced Egg-Right Technology uses the perfect amount of steam to cook the exact type of egg you want and shuts off automatically when done. The Copper Chef Electric Egg Maker is your necessary cookware item for meal-prep, high protein diet snacks, quick & easy omelets, perfect poached eggs, and even restaurant-style Eggs Benedict. Super Non-Stick Coating means nothing sticks to the surface – there’s no messy residue to clean up afterwards. Double Decker Design lets you cook 7 or 14 eggs at once. 5-Pc. Accessory Set Included with the inserts you need to cook 6 different types of eggs in a dash! -COPPER CHEF COOKWARE SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Our mission is to bring you only the highest quality products at the lowest prices possible. We believe every family can enjoy healthy and delicious homemade meals without breaking the budget or spending hours in the kitchen.
feature_bullets: Precise & effortless 1-touch cooking: want to know how to make perfect hard boiled eggs & more in a dash? The Copper Chef perfect egg cooker lets you choose exactly how you want your eggs cooked. Cooking requires just the push of one button! Marked measuring cup makes it easy to pour in the right amount of water you need - no timer or programming required. Egg-right technology circulates steam for perfect cooking and shuts off automatically when done.

Deluxe electric egg cooker – dishwasher safe parts: get fast, effortless clean-up - nothing sticks to the surface so there’s no residue left behind to scrape or scrub off. Easier and less mess than making eggs in an electric pressure cooker, on the stovetop, or in the microwave.

Multi-purpose – easy to peel hard boiled eggs & more: versatile egg cooker for meal prep, large families, cooking for parties, high protein diets, and picky eaters. Boil eggs for egg salad, as salad toppings, breakfasts on the go, pre-workout high protein meals & more. Cook deviled eggs, make easy breakfast omelets, or poach eggs for Sunday brunch.

Portable & compact automatic egg maker: the Copper Chef perfect egg cooker is compact & lightweight for fast and simple storage that won’t take up a lot of space in your cabinets. This is a must-have cookware item for apartments, smaller kitchens, dorm rooms, RV traveling & more.

Special features & accessories: want to know how to peel hard-boiled eggs? Perfect peel technology means you get clean, easy-to-peel hard boiled eggs every time. Cook 14 eggs at once or remove the extender wall to cook seven eggs on only one layer. Cook & look dome lets kids watch eggs while they cook! With built-in automatic shut-off and stand-by mode to prevent overcooking. 5-Pc. Accessory set includes: hard boiled egg insert & extender tray, poaching insert, omelet ring, and measuring cup.
